message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a high-quality item valued at $100, and I believe you'll find this price very attractive.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product, but I'm aiming to stay within my budget of $100.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $90 for the product?  This is a fair offer, considering the value you've placed on the product yourself.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget considerations. Let me propose a compromise at $92 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations and allows you to acquire the item you're interested in.
